resources.string: Sorry, something went wrong. try after some time.
What\'s your most important health goal right now?
Tell us a little bit more about yourself to get the full experience
Can you please enter your name?
Please enter a valid email id.
We have carefully crafted a set of habits for this ritual, try our recommendations!
Sorry, maximum 10 habits can be added in a single ritual!
Do your habits 3 days in a row to make them part of your daily behaviour!
If you\'d like your alarm to make a sound even if your phone is in silent mode, select this optoin. This is very useful for morning ritual and important ritual.
We really want to help you

Spread the word about your plan to live a healthier life....



(Sample Text) !

Sample Text.............
......
........
.....
......
 we will craft relevant information for you to keep you motivated!
I don\'t want to overwhelm you..let\'s take it one step at a time
"For the next 3 days, Drink Water when you wake up to kickstart your body and start your day with a success!"

string-array.name: homescreenttstext
string-array.item: As you get older, three things happen. First your memory starts to go…. and I can’t remember the other two.
Don’t worry about what people think. Most of them don’t do it very often.
I love our time together. But don’t forget your other friends and family as well. The worst thing we can do is isolate ourselves when we feel troubled.
I read in a magazine last week that light exercise like walking and stretching releases ‘feel good’ chemicals into our bloodstream. How about we try it later?
I really enjoy our time together.
I really need a day in between Saturday and Sunday.

I’ve found that writing down my thoughts helps me to organize the thoughts whirling in my mind. Of course I also destroy the evidence afterward. Why don’t you try it too? It might help get those pent up frustrations and emotions off your chest.
So how have you been today? Did you try anything new?
What a day. I met a friend that I hadn’t seen in ages the other day. We talked for hours about everything under the sun.
You are never too old to chase a new goal, or dream a new dream.
I really enjoy our meetups. You’re pretty cool.

string-array.name: myhabitavscreenttstext
string-array.item: And next on our agenda is-
And next on your program is.
And we are finished with this one. Next up.
At least these are going good today, right?
Boppin’ right along.
cool...
Don’t forget this next one too.
I have something new for you to try.
I love your ambition. Next up-
Let’s keep going.
Nice work! You’re on a roll.
No no, you’re not done yet. Next up.
Okay, okay, you had your fun. Now let’s try the next one.
You are quite the dedicated person.
Thank you for doing this. Now let’s go to the next one.
This should get your blood pumping a bit.
We’re not quite done yet. Moving along.
You are doing a wonderful job buddy. Let’s move on to the next challenge, shall we?
You’re doing good, all things considering. Next up:
You are getting better at this..lets look at next habit.
You are on quite a roll. Fantastic. Next is-.

string-array.name: moodtsi
string-array.item: I\'m sorry to hear that. I\'ll right here for you buddy. I\'ll do what I can. Why don\'t you relax. Maybe grab some hot tea or something, and I\'ll turn on some music.
I get that. Take a break. Enjoy some ambiance.
I understand the day is overwhelming right now. We will update our records later.
Why don\'t we use this as an opportunity to decompress, hmm? You will feel much better about your routine if you get a minute of you-time

string-array.name: moodtsielse
string-array.item: Got it! Why don\’t you rest in the garden a while? The band is doing something nice out there. No rush or anything. Let me know when you are ready to continue.
I know how you feel. Those days can be frustrating.But you\’ll succeed soon. Take a moment for yourself. We\’ll get rolling afterward.
Alright buddy. Let\’s take a deep breath, and think over the situation. Here is a new way to help bring life back into balance.

string-array.name: reminder
string-array.item: I know you are busy. What time is good for you on this one?
What would you like me to remind you about this week?
Let\'s keep our eyes on the prize... When are we doing this one?
Let me give you a hand with these.
Are these times still good for you?
